categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Vincine was a male Sith pureblood who served the Sith Empire as a Sith Inquisitor. Vincine wore black and red robes and carried a purple lightsaber, and he was selected by Darth Malgus to join a strike team consisting of Rotham, Kyrenic, and Andan with the purpose of capturing the Allusis.
